text: Three Girls Lost is a 1931 American drama movie directed by Sidney Lanfield and starring Loretta Young, Lew Cody, John Wayne, Paul Fix, Ward Bond, Joan Marsh, Joyce Compton, George Beranger. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1931 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Lanfield
title: Three Girls Lost
